turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need 3 large pies from Master Pizza for the Super Bowl Party I am having. How much will that cost me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Master Pizza location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Pleasantville.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, It looks like 3 large plain pies will run you 545 dollars plus tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I need 1 plain pie, 1 pepperoni pie and 1 sausage pie. We need some variety.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, each topping adds $1.50 to the price so you're looking at 48 dollars plus tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's not bad at all. Maybe i'll add another plain pie just to make sure we have enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 4 pies. 2 plain, 1 pepperoni and 1 sausage. That should be 63 dollars plus tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, let's go with that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Before I place the order for you, would you need any sides or beverages?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's a great idea! Let me get a side of buffalo wings. Everyone loves wings. Make that 2 sides of wings. I already have a bunch of beer and soda.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so each side of wings is an additional 10 dollars. Brinking your total up to 83 dollars plus tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to confirm, we are ordering four pizza's. Two of them will be plain, one will have pepperoni and 1 will have sausage. We are also adding two orders of buffalo wings. Correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have just placed the order for you online. It will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes. I will head over there shortly and bring it by your house.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, give me a call when you're on your way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. You can also see your order confirmation on the text message they sent to your cell phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ah! I have it right here.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. See you in a few.
